data.actual_result: Animation of selecting the server the first time pauses during the animation
data.expected_result: Animation of selecting the server is smooth
data.short_description: First time selecting a server has a broken animation
data.steps_to_repro: - Completely close and restart Discord - Open the server list, and select a random server - Observe the animation of the white selector bar and server icon as you select it - Select another server, and observe the white bar and server icon again - Reselect the server you selected in Step 2, and observer the animation
